comment: /** * Executes the command and returns a not-null * {@link ExecResult} instance. * * @param execCommand The command object, that describes the executable application * @return the result * @throws ExecException if the execution failed * @throws IOException if there is an invalid path in the working directory, * or if the absolute path of the command executable is invalid, * or if the executable does not exist */
code: /** * Executes the command and returns a not-null * {@link ExecResult} instance. * * @param execCommand The command object, that describes the executable application * @return the result * @throws ExecException if the execution failed * @throws IOException if there is an invalid path in the working directory, * or if the absolute path of the command executable is invalid, * or if the executable does not exist */ ExecResult execute(ExecCommand execCommand) throws ExecException, IOException.
